searchPlaceholder: What do you want to hear?
title: Title
author: Author
noBioYet: No bio yet. Click edit to add one!
404Message: The page you are looking for does not exist
404Redirect: Go back to the home page

2.title: Search Bar
2.text: Use this search bar to find audios by title or key words

3.title: Audios Table
3.text: In this table you can see the audios that match your search, or the most popular audios if you haven't searched for anything

4.title: Audio Details
4.text: Each audio entry shows key information: thumbnail, title, author, duration, creation date, rating, and play count

2.title: Audio Player
2.text: Use the audio player to play/pause the audio

3.title: Progress Bar
3.text: The progress bar shows the current time and duration of the audio, click on it to skip to a specific time

4.title: Volume Control
4.text: Click on the icon to mute/unmute the audio, and drag the slider to adjust the volume

5.title: Author Profile
5.text: Click on the author's name to visit their profile and see more audios by them

6.title: Community
6.text: In this section you will find statistics about the audio and comments from other users

7.title: Rate Audio
7.text: Click on the stars to rate the audio

8.title: Bookmark Audio
8.text: Click on the bookmark icon to save/remove the audio from your bookmarks

9.title: Comment Section
9.text: Scroll down to see comments from other users, and leave your own comment or reply

2.title: Profile Description
2.text: Click on the icon to edit your bio

3.title: Profile Picture
3.text: Click on the image to change your profile picture

4.title: Search Bar
4.text: Use this search bar to find your audios by title or key words

5.title: Audios Table
5.text: In this table you can see your audios that match the search, or your most popular audios if you haven't searched for anything

6.title: Audio Details
6.text: Each audio entry shows key information: thumbnail, title, duration, creation date, rating, and play count

7.title: Manage Audio
7.text: Click on the action buttons to edit or delete your audios

2.title: Search Bar
2.text: Use this search bar to find bookmarked audios by title or keywords

3.title: Audios Table
3.text: In this table you can see the bookmarked audios that match your search, or the audios you have bookmarked recently if you haven't searched for anything

4.title: Audio Details
4.text: Each audio entry shows key information: thumbnail, title, author, duration, creation date, rating, and play count

5.title: Manage Bookmarks
5.text: Click on the button to remove audios from your bookmarks
